title: Episode 15 w/ Styles P and Sheek Louch
itunes:title: Episode 15 w/ Styles P and Sheek Louch
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up at D-Block Studio's with Styles P and Sheek Louch of The Lox. The guys talk about the origins of The Lox, their time with Bad Boy, missed opportunities, where they are now and more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
